Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
ExtendedMerchantScreen
ExtendedMerchantScreen extends the MerchantScreen with additional features for villager interaction.
HandledScreensMixin
Mixin that redirects the registration of the MerchantScreen to use ExtendedMerchantScreen instead.
VillagerChatData
VillagerChatData holds the data of a VillagerEntity and the chat history of the player and the villager.
VillagerEntityInvoker
Mixin to invoke the clearSpecialPrices method in VillagerEntity.
VillagerEntityMixin
Mixin to call the onVillagerTradeOpen method when the VillagerEntity begins a trade Used to correctly identify currently active Villager trading GUIS.
VillagerTalk
Main serverside class for the VillagerTalk mod
VillagerTalkC2SNetworkingConstants
Constants for the client to server networking of the VillagerTalk mod.
VillagerTalkClient
 
VillagerTalkS2CNetworkingConstants
Constants for the server to client networking of the VillagerTalk mod.
VillagerTalkScrollableChatWidget
Copied from ScrollableTextWidget and modified so the setMessage(String) method actually works.
